article.description: Rider holds off Rice in overtime 97-93
article.headline: Rider holds off Rice in overtime 97-93
article.linkText: Rider holds off Rice in overtime 97-93
article.story: HOUSTON -- Anthony Myles scored 27 points and Daniel Stewart added 19 as Rider defeated Rice in overtime 97-93 Friday night. Stewart opened the overtime period with two free throws and hit a jumpshot to put Rider (2-3) up by three. Following exchanged 3-pointers by both teams, Stewart nailed two more from the charity stripe to seal the win for the Broncos. Myles was 7 of 13 from the field with a trio of 3-pointers and Zedric Sadler had 11 points. The Owls (2-4) trailed by 12 late in the game, but Austin Ramljak sparked a run with two 3-pointers and a pair of free throws to tie the game at 80. They took a late 84-82 lead, but Stewart made a game-tying layup and Sean Obi's last-second missed basket sent the game to overtime. Ramljak finished with 22 points and Seth Gearheart added 20, as both sank six 3-pointers.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
